thread.title: This video of a little girl singing 'Jag Ghoomeya' for Anushka Sharma is adorable
thread.title_full: This video of a little girl singing 'Jag Ghoomeya' for Anushka Sharma is adorable - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: This video of a little girl singing 'Jag Ghoomeya' for Anushka Sharma is adorable
text:
Anushka Sharma 
While shooting for the Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan recently, Anushka Sharma discovered that her young co-actor is also her fan.
The little girl confessed to Anushka that the latter’s Jag Ghoomeya from Sultan (2016) is her favourite track. She even crooned the song for the actress later. Well, the look on Anushka’s face says it all.
